fsrtool.name: fsrtool_snow_characters
fsrtool.structure: CREATE TABLE `fsrtool_snow_characters` ( `charID` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `corpID` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` text NOT NULL, `division` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `tz` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `posgunner` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `dread` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `carrier` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `joined` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `lastSeen` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `inactive` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `inCorp` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `afk` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `afkText` text NOT NULL, `investigate` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `notes` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`charID`,`corpID`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
